Package gui

Contains all the GUI classes and modules
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Embark
    Represent being "at the port", choosing what island to sail to next.
    Also displays information about every route (risks, cost, length...).

    Note: The player CAN game-over here, if there's no way of them leaving the island (being unable to afford any route, or if there's not enough time to reach the destination)
    GameOverScreen
    This screen is displayed whenever the player can no longer progress, like walking the plank, or being unable to sail.
    Note that also "winning" the game, like making it to the game duration, also counts as a game over.
    Displays: The player's name, ship, day reached, and total profit
    Lets you: Make a new game, see all your purchases, and quit.
    GameSetup
    The first menu a player sees.
    GUI
    The main class used to run the GUI of the game.
    OnIsland
    Represents the player at an island.
    From here the player can: Sail to a new island, buy/sell cargo, see their ship's stats, and view all their transactions.
    Sailing
    Represents time passing as the player sails between islands.
    Also handles random events that can occur while on the high seas.
    SaleScreen
    Popup menu - Displays a menu for buying/selling trade goods
    UpgradeSale
    Popup window - Displays a menu for buying/selling upgrade items
    ViewLedger
    Popup window - Displays every item bought by the player.
    Displays every item's purchase price, purchased at, and sale price (if applicable)
    ViewShipCharacteristics
    Popup window - Shows the stats of the player's ship
